115321.content:
Izuku "Deku" Midoriya was walking through the halls of school in-between classes, not quite sure what to do with his time... eventually seeing something as he walked.

There, in the middle of the hall, was a small, glowing green stone.

"Hm..? Wonder what that is..." he thought to himself as he approached it, timidly reaching out to it "Is it... glowing..?"

He gripped the stone in his hand, and suddenly a world of knowledge opened up to him.

It was... a wishing stone? It could grant any wish he wanted, and people just won't notice anything is different? He could do anything he wanted.

The power was so much. So much more than the quirk he had been given, and so much more than he could ever want...

But the question remained, what would he wish for..?

124121.content:
With a groan, Shego stumbled through the door, slamming it behind her and slumping against the inside. Drakken had returned to his villainous ways, and she had given it a go as well, but hadn’t found it as fun as it had been. Walking away was difficult, but proved easier than she had been expecting considering how fast the blue buffoon fell apart without her around. She now had a steady job and a place of her own. It wasn’t great, but at least she didn’t need to worry about it exploding or anything.

With a sigh, she shoved off the door and made her way through her apartment. Articles of clothing were stripped off as she went, staring with her blouse and working her way down, leaving a trail behind her till she was left in nothing but her skin.

Stepping into her shower, she started with a special wash to remove the makeup she was forced to wear across much of her skin to hide her rather noticeable coloring. Despite walking away from the path of villainy, presenting her true face was still too much of a risk. She lingered in the shower long after she had finished cleaning, letting the water pound atop her head and wash away her worries, if even for a moment. The sensation of the water flowing across her body soothed her, so much so that she almost dozed off right there. With a sigh, she stepped out and toweled off. She didn’t finish though, leaving her skin a bit damp after having to suffer another day of covering up.

After donning a pair of shorts and a too-big t-shirt, she sat down on the bed. The main point that made her pick this place was the view between several buildings of the park a few blocks over and the stretch of stars she could see over it. The bright lights of the city meant that she couldn’t see many, but it was enough for her for now.

Flopping back onto the bed, she let out a curse as she hit something hard in her pillow. Snarling, telltale green wisps starting to appear around her fingers, she plunged her other hand into the pillow case. Her anger faded somewhat when she pulled out a weird looking glowing green stone. She gritted her teeth, thinking that it had to be some cockamamie scheme of Drakken’s to try to lure her back. Well it wasn’t going to work, she was done with–

Her train of thought derailed as the stone let out a glow that outshone even her energy blasts. In a moment, she knew all about the wishing stone she now possessed and all that it would allow her to do. As the glow returned to its more subdued form, Shego’s mind whirled with the possibilities of what she could do. One soon drifted to the forefront of her thoughts though.
124121.title: A new life

choices: … Kim was more submissive to her.
…they were closer in age.
…she was a respected teacher again.
1241211.content:
Shego’s breath caught in her throat as she thought about the possibility. She had kept an eye on Kim’s progress over the past couple of years, watching as the young woman blasted off across the world saving people time and again. Shego also remembered the times they had gotten close, whether it was during their fights or when she had temporarily become Ms Go and taught at Kim’s school.

With her mind made up, she gripped the stone tight and made the wish. The stone’s glow grew brighter and then…nothing happened. The glow grew dim and there was no sign of any change. Grumbling, she was about to toss the stone away when a voice called from the door.

“What you got there, honey?”

Shego froze; the voice was oh so familiar and caused butterflies in her stomach. Her throat was dry as she turned around and saw the Kim Possible standing in the doorway. That lovely red hair spilled down around that face she had seen so many times. Shego ended up lost in those emerald eyes, a muted stammer was the only response that came to her lips. Kim glided across the room, the tank top and booty shorts highlighting the younger woman’s lithe figure.

“Aw, cat got your tongue?” she purred as she leaned over in front of Shego and brushed her fingers across the other’s lips.

A quick shake of her head and Shego managed to find her voice. “Prin–princess? What are you doing here!?”

“Well, where else would I be?”

Shego stammered back, “College?”

Kim furrowed her brow, “You know I go back next week. Are you feeling alright?” Worry tightened her face.

Waving her hand, she raced to come up with an excuse. “Yes, yes, just tired from today. Busy, busy, you know.”

“O-kay, if you say so,” Kim said, unconvinced but not pushing it. “Anyways, I can think of something to help you relax…” she went on to say, her voice becoming more low and sultry.

“Oh?” Shego asked with an arched brow. Then Kim leaned in closer, pressing their lips together. Shego’s heart skipped a beat. She could feel the heat radiating off of Kim, and smell the floral scent of the other’s shampoo. She reached up and ran her hands through Kim’s hair, caressing the back of her head. The kiss broke but only by a scant distance, their lips still almost in contact. “Oh…” was Shego’s only response.

Kim took the initiative, shoving Shego back onto the bed. The stone fell from the older woman’s grasp and bounced off, unnoticed by either. Kim took less than a second to shed her shirt, before slipping Shego’s off as well. Then their lips pressed together again and their hands roamed each other’s bodies.

Later, Shego drifted in a wonderful limbo. Kim ended up curled up beside her, with the redhead’s head nestled on Shego’s arm, sleeping away after their rapturous time together. Shego’s head spun with how much she loved what had resulted from the wish. And that was only the first. She already had an idea for the next.

As careful as she could be, she spied where the stone ended up and reached out for it. She was able to brush the stone with her fingertips. After a number of tries, she managed to cause the stone to shift enough for her to snatch it from the floor. Holding it above her, she stared into the glowing depths of the stone. The longer she looked at it, the more she thought it reminded her of the green of Kim’s eyes, rather than her own energy blasts.

A quick shake of the head followed. This was no time to get distracted. She had another wish to make. She wishes that…

It was an early morning in the Pride Lands. Kion, the young leader of the Lion Guard had woken up much earlier than usual and decided to go for a walk. Before he left the lair, he looked back at his still sleeping team with a big smile. One couldn't ask for better friends.

He had barely made it down the slope of Pride Rock, when he noticed a bright light coming from nearby and chose to investigate. When he arrived, he saw that it was a strange kind of stone that gave off the bright light.

"Woah," exclaimed Kion. "What kind of stone glows like that?" Out of curiosity, he reached out a paw and touched the stone. The moment he did so, his mind was flooded with new information.

"So; this is a Wishing Stone," said Kion to himself. "It seems a bit ridiculous; a stone that can alter reality through wishes."

"Then again; it did cause all this information to enter my head when I touched it. Maybe it really is magic."

Kion thought hard about what he should do with it. "I guess I'd better find out if this stone is the real deal. But, what should I wish for as a test?"

125331211.content:
Ben had just finished his patrol for the day with Rook and he was beat. As he approach his bed, he longed for an easier way of life. Sure, being a hero had its benefits, but crashing through stands in Undertown and falling into sewers were certainly not among them. Ben fell down face first into his pillow to sleep the day off when he landing was a bit more impactful than he predicted. SMACK

"OW! Ah, man. Who put something under my pillow. This better not be a Plumber thing, I'm done for today."

As he reached under his pillow, he found a strange stone with a strange glow. Well at the very least a glow he wasn't used to. As he held it, it seemed to tell him that it was a Wishing Stone and it could grant him any wish. At first, Ben freaked out and almost dropped the stone, but after some fumbling he grab it once more.

"Anything I want, huh?" As Ben racked his brain, he decided to wish...

125333222322.content:
Bonnie hates Kim possibles attitude. She always acted like she was so great just because she’s a secret agent who’s parents are a heart surgeon and a rocket scientist. Sure she’s saved the world once or twice but she didn’t have to act so happy so lucky about it. Bonnie just couldn’t grasp why Kim would get more attention and recognition than her when she’s just as smart, just as great, and far prettier than that loser will ever be.

“I wish there was just some way that I could take her down a peg or two, and show her who’s boss” Bonnie lamented to herself. That’s when Bonnie tripped over a stone and fell into a puddle of mud, Bonnie was now just fed up. As though this day couldn’t get any worse she had to go and get her new designer clothes dirty.

“Oh my god!” Bonnie shouted in frustration. “Ugh this is so unfair, my new clothes are ruined, oh I wish they didn’t have to get ruined like this”. That’s when Bonnies day changed from an awful one, to the happiest day in her life. suddenly as if out of nowhere,Bonnies outfit was clean. So clean that it almost looked she just bought it from the store and wore it out.

“How did that happen?” Bonnie thought to herself. She looked around for anything that could answer her question until she saw the stone. Bonnie instantly realised that the stone could grant wishes. A million ideas went through her head in that moment. She could end Wars, cure diseases or even bring peace to the world. But she knew that those things could wait. Wait as long as they need to just as soon Bonnie was done making Kim remember who’s better then her and putting Kim in her place.

Bonnie’s mouth twister into a devilish grin as she walked to school more confident than ever with one goal to find Kim possible and have fun. Bonnie was then outside the school and had two thoughts going through her head. Should she just hunt down Kim and embarrass her in any way she felt like? Or should she try and test out the stone to see if it even let her do that?
125333222322.title: Bonnie

Finally, which bovine specifically?

Sarah Traviss is a nineteen year old black and white furred cow serving as a low level secretary for the local branch of a multinational corporation. She really ends up working more as a gopher than anything else. The young woman is tall yet flat as a board, which causes her no end of envy and self-loathing.

choices: Her first major wish is to change herself, making herself much curvier.
She instead wishes to get back at Vanessa, switching their lives.

15331211.content:
“I knew you wouldn’t be able to see it through.”

Those words, and the way her boss Vanessa Quinn said them, continued to make Sarah’s blood boil even after almost an hour. The young woman hoped that leaving the building and having her lunch in the nearby park would be enough to compose herself. It was just no use though. Anytime her mind strayed, she could hear Vanessa saying that with such disdain. Sarah tried, she really did, but there was no way for her to finish up all the filing work that she had been assigned in the little time she had been allowed. Plus, she still had to make the coffee runs, answer the phone, and everything else at the same time. Vanessa had been setting her up to fail, and had succeeded at that.

Sarah sighed. It’s not like she could do anything about it either. Vanessa was the daughter of one of the upper managers, and was being groomed to move up the ranks as quick as could be. In the meantime though, she seemed to delight in making those beneath her do the most demeaning tasks. When she couldn’t come up with one of those, she fell back on her other tactic of giving impossible jobs and pointing out the inevitable failure.

A chime from her phone broke Sarah from the dark clouds of her thoughts. The respite didn’t last long though as the text was from Vanessa. She was bragging that one of her cronies was able to finish up what Sarah had failed to do, disregarding how Sarah had been almost finished anyways.

With a shout, Sarah threw her phone through the air. Grinding her teeth and crossing her arms, she fumed for several seconds before realizing what a mistake she had made. Jumping up from the bench, she stumbled through the brush, looking for her phone and hoping it hadn’t broken. Her fears were proven true when she found it with a cracked screen. Swearing under her breath, she tried in vain to get it to respond despite the damage.

Kicking through the knee high grass, she paused as an odd glowing green stone went flying through the air. It hit a nearby tree and came to rest among the roots. Her first thought was that the rock was radioactive or something, but as her panic died down, she realized that was preposterous. Despite some unease, she shuffled closer to the rock and nudged it with the toe of her shoe. The green glow was striking and noticeable even in the daylight. She hesitated for several more moments before picking up the stone. It felt oddly warm in her grasp. Shrugging she turned her attention back to her phone. Sighing, she added going to get her phone repaired to her already huge mental to-do list. Oh, how she wished that her phone was as good as new.

She yelped as the phone…blurred in her hand. That was the only way she could describe it. It was only for a moment, but once it had passed, the damaged screen was fixed. Even the wear on the corners was gone like it had never been there. It was almost as if…her phone was as good as new. Tearing her eyes away from the phone, she glanced at the smooth stone still held in her other hand. Could it…? No, that was absurd; there was no way there was a connection. She had been mistaken about how damaged her phone was, that was all. But that didn’t seem right either.

An idle thought to know what was going on crossed her mind. A wave of heat swept through her skull, making it feel like her head had burst into flames. As soon as it passed, she knew that the stone was the cause. She didn’t see any details, but she now knew of the stone appearing in many other worlds and granting the owner of each any wish they desired. A wide smile crossed Sarah’s face as she thought about all the fun she could now have.
15331211.title: The start of something wonderful

choices: Make Vanessa her slave.
Steal Vanessa’s curves and add them to her own.
Sarah has something else in mind for the dragoness.
153312111.content:
She followed the first thought that popped into her head, and felt a bloom of heat spread throughout her body. Looking down, she saw the same blurring effect around the edge of her body. Sarah’s jaw dropped as she watched her flat chest swell through cup sizes. Her amazement only grew as she watched her blouse and jacket reshape and grow to keep pace with her growing assets. Before long, it now looked like she was smuggling a pair of bowling balls under her clothes. Not to be outdone though, her lower half filled out as well. Her stick-like legs soon blossomed into thick and well rounded pillars, complete with a very generous rump bringing up the rear.

The stone’s effect passed as quick as it had started, leaving a much different looking Sarah to explore her new body. She was fond of how her breasts and hips had turned out, as well as how the rest of her body had taken on some softer and less angular shapes. She was a little more undecided about how even her belly had softened and turned a bit plush. After a bit though, she realized that it fit a bit better with the rest of her new body than had it been completely flat. She also started to feel some added strain from her expanded frame, but a quick wish solved that issue and she was able to support herself with ease now.

Making her way back to the path where she had left the remains of her lunch, she found that even her walk had been changed. There was now a bit extra motion to her hips and shoulders to help accentuate her enhanced shape. Tiding up, she set out to head back to her workplace. Partway there though, she realized that there was no reason for her to be a lowly secretary gopher, not with the power she now possessed. In fact, she should be the boss. After several more moments of thought, Sarah instead decided to wish that she just quietly owned the corporation from behind the scenes instead. That way, she didn’t actually have to know how to run the company or anything. She did include that she still received an enormous regular pay to the wish as well though.

As she sashayed through the building, Sarah heard the whispers about who she was and the responses about the rumors of who really owned the company. Some of the employees seemed to know exactly who she was though, and they tended to have looks of awe tinged with worry upon seeing her sweeping past. Sarah reveled in the attention she was attracting now, such a welcome change from being almost invisible. It got even better when she came to Vanessa’s office.

The curvy dragoness didn’t even look up from the paperwork on her desk when she said, “I told you already, I didn’t want to be bothered.”

“Oh, I think you’ll make an exception for me,” Sarah said, arching an eyebrow.

“Really?”Sarah’s former boss said, unconvinced. “And why would that…” she started as she looked up, then her face fell and her eyes bulged as she jumped to her feet. “Oh my…I apologize so much for that, Ms Traviss. I thought you were my secretary or someone else–anyone else. I didn’t know you were coming here today.” The words spilled from her mouth so fast, it seemed that she would end up tying her tongue in knots.

Sarah waved her hand as if it didn’t matter, “Just thought I would drop in and see how things were going.”

“Oh, of course, ma’am, whatever you want,” she said and flashed a smile that pulled her lips taught with worry. “Do you want a coffee, or anything? I can send my secretary for it.” Without waiting for a response, the dragoness called out, “Laura, where are you!?”

“No, no, that won’t be necessary,” Sarah said.

This made Vanessa pause as she tried to figure out what this was about. While the dragoness wasted her time to figure that out, Sarah spent several moments letting her gaze drift up and down her former tormentor. It was strange, looking over the dragoness before would cause the green eyed monster to stir within Sarah. Sarah coveted the feminine curves that the other possessed, hating how her own body had betrayed her and left the bovine without any to speak of. Now with the stone having altered her body in such a wonderful fashion though, that feeling was nowhere to be found. That didn’t mean that Sarah wasn’t going to punish the dragoness for everything she had put so many through, including herself. It was just a matter of what punishment she would hit the dragoness with.
153312111.title: Curves and power

choices: Sarah takes Vanessa for some food, the dragoness looks hungry.
The cow leads her pet to get some toys.
The pair head for Sarah’s home to put their new relationship to use.
1533121111.content:
Oh yes, that will do just fine Sarah thought as the idea about making Vanessa her personal slave came to her. Vanessa seemed to enjoy treating anyone she thought beneath her as a slave, so it was fitting that it be turned around on her.

“There was something else,” Sarah said aloud. The dragoness focused again on the bovine as she continued, “I have a special new job for you.”

“Oh? What is it?” Vanessa said, intrigued.

“Why, I want you to be my slave, of course.”

Vanessa froze upon hearing that. Several moments later, her jaw dropped open in surprise. She then seemed to realize just who had just said that to her.

“What did you say, ma’am?” she asked in clear disbelief.

“You heard me,” Sarah responded.

“You’re serious…aren’t you? I thought maybe you were joking or something, but…Why in hell do you think you can say something like that?” her voice raising and a vein starting to stand out in her neck. Then as an afterthought, she snarled, “ma’am.”

Sarah was unperturbed. “Oh come now, Vanessa. Surely you didn’t forget that outrageous gambling debt I agreed to take care of for your father in return for your services?” As she spoke, she reached into her skirt pocket and grasped the stone within, willing it to be true. “We all signed the contract just yesterday.”

Vanessa paled and her mouth opened and closed several times as the stone’s effect washed over her. Her eyes turned misty as they fell to the desk, away from Sarah’s gaze.

“I’m sorry, I don’t know how it slipped my mind,” the dragoness said with a trembling chin.

“Aw, don’t fret my dear,” pressing up on the dragoness’s chin so that they were looking eye to eye again. “We’re going to have plenty of fun together.” Sarah couldn’t resist letting a devious grin cross her face.

It was not a surprise to Sarah that this did little to ease Vanessa’s worry and fear. The buxom bovine didn’t mind this at all though.

“Of course, whatever you say, ma’am,” Vanessa said after gulping.

“You know,” tapping a finger on her chin, “how about you call me Mistress?”

“Of course…Mistress,” she practically choked on Sarah’s new title, but was rewarded anyways with an affectionate pat on the cheek.

“Come along,” then after a moment’s consideration, “pet.”

Whatever retort died on Vanessa’s tongue under Sarah’s gaze, though it was obvious that the dragoness wasn’t as restrained within her mind. Sarah chuckled; she was really going to enjoy this.
1533121111.title: Tormenting the tormentor

choices: Go small; Sarah can always push for more later.
Strike the middle ground; enough for Vanessa to glut herself, but not too much.
Go big; get plenty of food for the dragoness to stuff herself with.
15331211111.content:
With Vanessa following along like a loyal lapdog, Sarah retraced her steps. On the way out, Laura popped up at last. The rather airheaded brunette had always been one of Vanessa’s most willing cronies, so it was only fitting that she ended up replacing Sarah after her wishes. It took several rounds of explaining to make the human understand that Vanessa wouldn’t be working here any longer. At the end, Sarah was irked enough that she used the stone to transfer most of the weight from Laura’s substantial bust and rump to her stomach instead. Watching her waddle off, trying in vain to support her soft yet pregnant looking stomach, brought another grin to Sarah’s face.

Downstairs, Sarah used the stone and swapped her junker for a much more luxurious car, and they were off. A short, and quiet, trip later and Sarah led her new plaything through the doors to Sunset.

She had only been to this restaurant once before to bring a bundle of files to Vanessa, though the bovine hadn’t even made it past the waiting room. The maître d' only scoffed and wouldn’t budge no matter what. Vanessa later blamed Sarah for the missing paperwork even though the dragoness was the one who had forgotten them in the first place. Things were going to be very different this time though.

The same maître d' was present in the lobby. The dark furred fox still had his nose so high in the air that it should have been snowcapped. Undaunted, Sarah marched right up to him. He eyed the pair for a moment before asking if they had a reservation. Sarah could hear the sneer in his voice even if his face was an expressionless mask. Sarah responded that they didn’t, but that wouldn’t be an issue. The fox started to respond, but his mask broke as Sarah’s latest wish made it so that she was a frequent and very important patron at the restaurant. The fox apologized again and again for not recognizing her before letting her and Vanessa pass.

The place was empty for the most part. Not surprising since most of its clientele tended to arrive more towards evening. Or at least that’s how it always seemed whenever she wandered past heading for a much lower class of eatery. The sparse crowd suited Sarah just fine though, there were enough people to notice without causing too much of a scene. Motioning for Vanessa to take a seat at one of the tables, Sarah made sure to pull her seat a bit closer to the dragoness. Vanessa looked like she had bit into a lemon for a moment, but bit her tongue and didn’t say anything.

A waiter came by soon enough baring menus. Sarah took one, but said that Vanessa wouldn’t need hers. For a moment, the waiter cocked his head and lowered his brows before a subtle shake of his head hid his confusion away again. Sarah looked over the menu, pondering how far she was going to push her first major command.
15331211111.title: Feeding time

choices: A penthouse apartment in the heart of the city
A fabulous mansion in a less urban portion of the city
A palatial estate outside the city
153312111113.content:
After several seconds of looking the menu over, Sarah proceeded to order four full size meals for Vanessa and a small salad for herself. The waiter froze slack jawed for a moment before another tiny shake of his head was followed by him agreeing and moving off. Vanessa was more open with her expression, torn between anger, disgust, and outright shock.

Filling the silent gap, Sarah said, “If you’re a good girl and eat everything I got for you, maybe I’ll give you a reward.”

Vanessa looked on the verge of giving word to what was on her mind, but was cut off by the arrival of some wine. The waiter said that it was compliments of the house. Sarah was unfamiliar with anything except more bargain basement wines, and found the taste to be pleasant but not really for her. Vanessa on the other hand gulped down several glasses in quick succession, in an obvious attempt to drown her sorrows.

The pair was content to let the time pass in silence till the food arrived. A pair of waiters came each baring a large tray covered with plates of food. It was rather laughable seeing the many plates laid out before Vanessa, while Sarah had only the single bowl for her salad.

After thanking and dismissing the waiters, Sarah turned to Vanessa and said, “Looks like you’ve got a bit here. You better get started.”

“I already ate,” Vanessa ground out.

“Those three carrots and a half bottle of juice don’t count as much of a meal.” Then with a more frigid tone, “Now be a good little pet and get eating.

Vanessa ground her teeth together and clenched her fists till her knuckles were white. With a quiet gulp, the tension was forced away and she picked up a fork and dug in. Sarah couldn’t resist letting out a slight chuckle before spearing a bit of salad and devouring it. The dragoness made short work of the steak and baked potato. Though as she started on the shrimp scampi, it was soon clear to see that she was approaching her limits.

A slight frown crossed Sarah’s face. She wanted to hurt and humiliate the dragoness, but she didn’t want to end up killing her or anything like that. Fortunately, there was an easy way to make it so that the dragoness could continue to glut herself without any grave danger.

Sneaking a hand under the table, Sarah grasped the stone. She then wished that Vanessa would not suffer any permanent injury or death of any sort due to her Mistress’s commands. The odd warping effect around the dragoness was lost in the subdued lighting within the restaurant. Sarah wasn’t sure that Vanessa would have noticed even in broad daylight. She seemed to be all but lost in stuffing herself. Sarah hoped that she hadn’t already broken the dragoness’s will already. It was a bit more fun when she had hopes of resistance, for now at least.

Soon enough, Sarah finished off her salad, freeing herself to watch in enjoyment as Vanessa continued to eat and eat. The first bottle of wine was soon finished, and as a reward for such a good job so far, Sarah went ahead and requested a second. The waiter that brought the bottle had a look of disgust on his face and departed as soon as he could. There were similar expressions on most of those around them, watching the dragoness stuffing herself. Eyebrows were tipped down and noses crinkled as they tried and failed to be subtle about what they thought of the impromptu show.

A blush was creeping up Vanessa neck and into her cheeks. Whether it was from embarrassment, the discomfort of her overstuffed stomach, the wine hitting her system, or a combination of all three, Sarah wasn’t sure. She also didn’t care very much about that. Instead, the bovine scooted her chair just a little bit more and pressed her hands into the firm bulge of the dragoness’s stomach.

Vanessa froze with a few pieces of pasta hanging from her lips. Sarah repeated her command for Vanessa to eat it all and the dragoness returned to eating bit by bit. Sarah upped the confusion as she started to rub and massage the swollen lump of dragoness stomach. Her tender touch was soon rewarded with a loud belch escaping from Vanessa’s lips.

Several gasps came from around the pair, but Sarah didn’t pay them any heed. Her sole focus was Vanessa. The dragoness’s face continued to burn bright as she continued to slurp up the pasta and sauce. That plate soon joined the others in being cleared of all but the smallest scraps of food, leaving only the fourth meal.

“I’m…going to…explode…If I…eat anything…else,” Vanessa managed to gasp out.

Sarah scoffed while continuing to rub the dragoness’s stuffed belly. “Nonsense, I’m sure that you won’t. Why would I want to do something like that to you anyways?”

Vanessa seemed unconvinced, but even still dug her fork into the chicken and rice. She was panting with every breath and groaning almost as often now. The mass of food packed away felt rock hard to Sarah’s fingers. She smiled as Vanessa continued to eat, even if it was even slower than before.

It took almost as long as the first three combined, but Vanessa did manage to stuff the last traces of the sole remaining meal into her stomach. She let the fork fell onto the plate with a clatter. Slumping back in her chair, she groaned and whimpered as she struggled to keep the food down.

“You did excellent, pet,” Sarah cooed as she continued to rub the solid mass of Vanessa’s stomach.

Both stopped cold as a new noise sounded out. It didn’t take either of them long to realize that one of the buttons on Vanessa blouse had given up the fight and launched across the room.

The dragoness’s face blazed while she muttered, “Oh my god…” between panting breaths, while Sarah’s smile grew even wider.

“Will you be needing anything else?” a voice said, drawing the pair’s attention away from each other.

It was the same waiter as before. While his voice betrayed no emotion, he didn’t have quite as much control over his face. It was plain to see that he wished he didn’t have to be the one to be here right now. He was also obviously wishing that the two of them would just leave.

“Yes, in fact we will,” Sarah started, ignoring his discomfort.

She was cut off by Vanessa pleading, “P-p-please…”

“Please what?” Sarah said, her gaze turning back to her draconic slave. “Please remember to reward you for doing such a good job and eating everything? As if I would forget that darling.” Snapping her focus back to the waiter, “I think I remember seeing that you had a Tiramisu on the menu, we’ll take one of those. And two slices of the–No better make it a whole Black Forest cake. Oh and a Crème Brulee. I think we’ll take it all to go though.”

“Of course, we’ll get that right out for you, ma’am,” he said before darting off, his relief palatable.

Sure enough, within just a few minutes, the desserts were brought out. Sarah, in return, paid more than enough for the food and the second bottle of wine, leaving a large margin extra for the excellent service as she put it. From the staff she saw, it was clear they loved the extra pay, but not what they had to go through to get it. Sarah helped Vanessa to her feet and out the door, but found her eyes returning to the diamond of scaled belly peaking through the hole that opened in Vanessa’s blouse. The buttons above and below the hole looked strained as well and didn’t seem that they would hold up much longer.

After putting the desserts and Vanessa into her car, Sarah paused as she realized that her little dump of an apartment wasn’t up to snuff for her new life either. Pulling the stone from her pocket, she tossed it into the air. Catching it, she made a wish for a new home to better suit her.
153312111113.title: Go big or go home

choices: Sarah decides on a collar to go around that lovely neck.
After thinking about it, Sarah wants Vanessa to get a tattoo.
Her choice is something even more permanent, a brand.
1533121111131.content:
Yes, a modern day mountaintop castle, that will be wonderful, Sarah thought as she wished it into being.

Vanessa didn’t pay any attention to the stone or how Sarah looked at it with glee. Her focus was only on the pain radiating out from her overstuffed stomach.

A short time later, after following the GPS directions, Sarah was helping Vanessa out of the car. The staff of the building recognized Sarah and greeted her even as the glutted dragoness did her best to keep up. Up and up they went in the elevator, higher and higher. At the top was a small entry way. The door across from the elevator opened with a key that replaced Sarah’s old door key.

Stepping inside took Sarah’s breath away. She heard Vanessa gasp as well, even though the dragoness tried to hide it. The view of the city below was fantastic, while the penthouse itself was a bit subdued but with plenty of wealth hinted at as well.

“Welcome to your new home, pet,” Sarah said with a flourish.

Vanessa grumbled something under her breath, her fingers lightly touching her stretched belly scales. Even that was enough to make her hiss with a bit of pain.

“You should say something nice, like ‘Thank you, Mistress, for taking such good care of me and letting me live here with you.’ Go on, I’m waiting.”

Vanessa grumbled again, but relented a bit and repeated the line even though it must have burned her to do so. Sarah gave the dragoness an affectionate pat on the head and thanked her for her kind words, which made Vanessa grit her teeth and seethe. Then Sarah passed her hand down over her slave’s stomach, turning the almost growl into a whimper.

“Come along, pet. It feels like you’ve got a bit more room, and we don’t want the desserts to get cold, do we?”

Vanessa stifled a sob even as she followed in Sarah’s wake. Both of them ended up with a bit of a tour as Sarah tried to find the room she was looking for. After several failures though, she stood in the doorway to the bedroom. The bed looked glorious, and even at first glance, she could tell the closet was filled with clothes that would flaunt and accentuate her body. Looking back over her shoulder, she saw that that Vanessa only had eyes for the bed. Her gaze was locked there and from the way she was gritting her teeth, she was far from happy.

Undisturbed by the dragoness’ reaction, Sarah took Vanessa’s hand and led her over to the bed. Then she pushed on Vanessa’s shoulders and made her lie down. The dragoness resisted even though the relief she was feeling from getting off her feet was plain as day on her face. Then Sarah turned to the bag of treats she had brought from the restaurant. She wavered between which would be first, before deciding on the Crème Brulee.

The sugar shell snapped as a spoon plunged through. Vanessa looked a bit green, but even still yielded as she opened her mouth as Sarah held it out for her. Sarah couldn’t resist taking a spoonful for herself, but restrained herself and made sure the rest ended up further stuffing Vanessa.

Next came the Tiramisu followed by the Black Forest cake in short order. After several more bites, another button shot off of Vanessa’s blouse to clatter on the floor across the room. The dragoness didn’t seem to notice though, her eyes glazed over as she forced herself to eat bite after bite. Sarah squirmed against the side of Vanessa, ecstatic at how wonderful everything was. She could hardly restrain herself, and decided that she didn’t need to after a bit.

She set the rest of the cake down beside the dragoness. Vanessa already had her mouth open for the next bite, her mind so clouded she didn’t know what was happening. Sarah then reached up and started to undo her blouse button by button. Finished, she tossed it aside, letting her breasts hang free in the lacy bra underneath. Then she leaned over, letting her bust squash against the hard dome of Vanessa’s stomach, soft yielding to hard. Another belch escaped Vanessa’s mouth, and there was a flicker in her eyes, but that was all.

Sarah returned her attention to the remains of the cake, almost half of it remained, and she wasn’t about to let it go to waste. She cut off further bites, feeding them to the dragoness, and her pet ate it all up. Sarah could feel the hard mass beneath her breasts expanding with each and every bite, the tightness growing ever more so along the way.

At last, the last of the cake was gone to join the rest simmering in the drum tight expanse that was Vanessa’s stomach. Vanessa dropped into a fitful sleep at that moment, moaning and twitching. Her stomach gurgled and groaned as it struggled to hold onto everything packed within. Lying there beside the dragoness, Sarah could feel herself dozing off, lulled by the sounds of Vanessa’s stressed digestion. Before she drifted off herself, Sarah thought that perhaps she should reward Vanessa for the good she had done throughout the day. It could even be something to help cement Vanessa new position in life for the dragoness.
1533121111131.title: Just desserts

choices: The next day
A week passes
One month later
15331211111311.content:
Within a few moments, Sarah decided on a collar. It would complement Vanessa’s neck as well as providing a constant reminder of her new position. Sarah refined the idea in her mind’s eye. Then she gripped the stone tight and wished it into being. A case wavered into being on the bedside table. Opening it, Sarah smirked at how perfect it looked.

A simple black band with a large gemstone that shone with either Sarah’s or Vanessa’s eye color depending on the viewing angle. Encircling the stone was a thin golden setting. Property of Sarah Traviss was visible on the setting, a faint inner glow picking out the letters. Beneath the surface though lay more incredible things due to the stone. The collar would never need cleaning and would never get too tight to choke her. The buckle would also be impossible to undo by anyone but Sarah as well.

Sarah smiled again as she shut the case and returned it to the table. She wanted Vanessa awake to see and feel the collar closing around her throat. With that finished, Sarah settled down on the bed again. She soon slipped asleep, lulled by the noise of Vanessa’s breathing and digestion.

She awoke early the next morning, her mind briefly fogged and wondering where she was. Then her mind reconnected and she remembered the wonderful stone and everything that had come of it. Vanessa was still slumbering, curled up on her side now. Pushing up on one elbow, Sarah saw that the enormous mound of the dragoness’ stomach had shrunk overnight. It was still far larger than she had every allowed it to be before Sarah and the stone though. On a whim, Sarah stuck a finger into the mass and found it softer and more pliable under the scales than she was expecting . Vanessa moaned and swatted at Sarah’s hand before going still again, her breathing remained deep and slow.

Sarah then slipped from the covers that had been drawn up over the two of them sometime during the night. She removed the rest of her clothes and put them along with her blouse in a hamper. After a bit of poking around, she found herself in a luxurious bathroom that took her breath away. The shining fixtures and wealth displayed even here was a far cry from the dirt, dingy, and barely functional bathroom she had suffered before.

When she recovered, she padded across the stone tiles to the shower alcove. The sunken whirlpool bath in the center of the room drew her gaze along the way. Inside the shower, she found the controls daunting. Rather than a simple handle, this one possessed a display with a bewildering mix of symbols and colors. Her hesitant poking rewarded her with an icy blast of water from every direction. Slapping at the controls again shifted the temperature to the other extreme till it felt like she was being boiled alive. Several other frantic attempts caused panels scattered about the alcove to bloom with varied and shifting colors and patterns, as well as making the flow pulse and vibrate.

At last, she was able to make the water pleasantly warm and soothing. She savored the feeling of the steams flowing across her body’s curves. A few more careful prods at the controls and music piped through speakers, adding to her enjoyment.

Sarah dawdled under the water for far longer than the temperamental and shoddy water heater at her old place would have allowed. Her fingers were turning pruney by the time she turned her attention to the soaps waiting nearby. Each smelled like heaven, a wonderful mix of berry and floral scents that ease as well as excited her at the same time. They felt even better as she shampooed and then lathered her fur. She wasted a bit more time watching the foams circle the drain beneath her as the water continued to flow across her body to the floor. It was with more than a little regret that she fumbled with the controls and shut the water off. Only now did she see the Favorites menu that would have made things far simpler.

Grumbling under her breath and embarrassed at the trouble she had gone through without need, she stepped out onto the warmed stone. She grabbed a nearby towel—that looked to have cost more than her old junker of a car did—and did a quick job of drying her body. As she made her way back across the bathroom, she paused at a full length mirror and couldn’t resist her gaze straying up and down her reflection. She admired how much better she looked all thanks to the stone. That brought a smile back to her face as she retraced her steps back to the bedroom. A slight frown soured her as she saw that Vanessa was still asleep. Sarah then waved it off after considering the food coma the dragoness had to be experiencing after the previous day. Drawing a luxurious robe from the closet, Sarah set off to explore the rest of her “new” home.

Her wandering tour delighted her along every step. As even seen on that first glance, the wealth on display was for the most part tasteful and steered clear of being gaudy. She could even see how everything fit with her tastes. It was as if this was her home for quite some time and not something that sprang up in only a moment. She chuckled to herself as she remembered that the stone had combined those otherwise contradictory states. Even if she was the only one to know that she had lived in much worse conditions only the day before.

Her wanderings were soon given a bit of focus as she followed a delectable scent in the air. Tracking the aroma brought her to a kitchen larger than her entire old apartment had been. She felt a pleasant shiver down her spine as she realized that she would be getting a lot of use out of this room alone. Not only was there Vanessa to consider, but Sarah had always wanted to put her culinary talents to use. She had never been able to before though due to the subpar kitchen she had dealt with before as well as a lack of supplies and time.

Then she noticed the coffee machine and found the scrumptious smell had been coming from the fresh brewed pot there. The taste was even more astounding, miles beyond the bitter and almost chewy brew that had glopped out of her beat up old machine before. The buzz she felt was also much smoother and mellower, making her feel awake and ready for the day.

Taking the steaming mug with her, she felt herself drawn to the enormous windows that overlooked a rooftop terrace. Beyond the pool, she could see signs of the city below already bustling and racing to get through the day. How she didn’t miss the rat race.

Tearing her eyes away, Sarah returned to the bedroom. She was going to wake up Vanessa if she wasn’t up already. It turned out to be unnecessary as the dragoness had already woken up. She hadn’t stripped off her clothes either. Instead, she was staring at the damage her swelling stomach had caused to her blouse, and gaping at the remnants of her forced gluttony. Her head whipped about as she heard Sarah enter. Sarah couldn’t help but feel a slight tinge of concern seeing the tears welling in Vanessa’s eyes. It was short lived though. Sarah squashed it down with a reminder of what a living hell that Vanessa had made Sarah’s life. It was about time that someone put the dragoness in her place.

“Good, you’re up. I was starting to think you might waste the whole day in bed,” Sarah said in as pleasant a voice as she could. “And now that you are awake, I can give you a present for doing so well yesterday.”

Vanessa paled as she heard that. She had seen how Sarah rewarded her after the restaurant. What other mess could be coming now?

Sarah grabbed the case from the bedside table and commanded the dragoness to face the mirror. Vanessa did so with more than a little hesitation. Then Sarah pulled the collar out of the box and—in one swift and fluid motion—pulled it tight around Vanessa’s throat.

“There you go, doesn’t that look nice?” Sarah said, taking hold of Vanessa’s head and making sure that she was staring right at the reflection.

Vanessa growled deep in her throat, her muscles tensing beneath Sarah’s grasp. Sarah thought the dragoness might have reached her breaking point and was going to whip around and hit her. But then the moment passed, and Vanessa all but deflated.

“It does,” Vanessa mumbled even though it was clear that she didn’t believe that at all.

Even still, Sarah continued, “I’m glad you think so, pet. Now come along, it’s time for breakfast and I have so many ideas I want to use.”
15331211111311.title: Exploring and controlling

choices: Someone scaly
Someone with feathers
Someone that is something else again
153313.content: Okay, not a human and not furry. So what else could you be?
153313.title: Other character choices

choices: Something draconic
Something in the lizard family
Neither of those, something else instead.
1533131.content: In that case, what type of scaled creature finds the stone?
1533131.title: Scaly character choices

choices: I start training like a professional wrestler.
I show off my size weight strength and pro wrestling skills.
Free Choice Chapter.
154.content:
Once upon a time yours truly an anthropomorphic animated blue Anubis chihuahua lived in an animated world.

You see our world's similar to that of the real world, but in this case our world's animated and whatnot, but enough about that.

My story started one day in my backyard as I one day discovered a glowing green stone that was on the ground, as I picked it up and made a wish.

"I wish that I was the biggest fattest and strongest face aligned pro wrestler ever seen." I said as I made my wish as the green glowing stone granted my wish as I transformed into a super sized pro wrestler who was far more bigger fatter and stronger than ever before.

Now what will I do next?
154.title: No, in a world of my own design!

info.brief_description: A magical stone that grants any wish finds its way to various worlds. What happens next?
info.description:
Idea from Naruto and the Wishing Stone 2.0 by Rosebunse

The Wishing Stone is a mystical item that grants unlimited wishes for the person who holds it. Only the person holding onto the stone when the wish is made will notice the effects of the wishes; everyone else will believe any changes made by the stone is normal. The first person to find the stone is the only one who can use the stone and will see it as a green glowing stone. Everyone else will see it as an ordinary stone.

The world of any fictional realm is fair game and any wish is okay. I only ask that all entries be readable. Other than that, have fun!
